EngLawName: Venue and Facility Maintenance Fee Standards for National Taiwan Arts Education Center
LawName: 國立臺灣藝術教育館場地設施維護規費收費標準
histories: Enacted by Letter Yi-Zhan-Zi No. 0930001954 on July 21 , 2004
Revised by Order Yi-Zhan-Zi No. 0940001467 on June 1, 2005
Revised by Order Yi-Zhan-Zi No. 0940002376 on Sept. 8, 2005
Revised by Order Yi-Yan-Zi No. 1030001762 on May. 15, 2014
Revised by Order Yi-Yan-Zi No. 1070000466A on Feb. 1 ,2018

articles.content: The Fee Standards are set according to Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.

Maintenance fees for the performance venue, exhibition rooms as well as conference rooms of the National Taiwan Arts Education Center are charged as follows:
1. Maintenance Fee Standards for Performance Venues (As attachment 1)
2. Maintenance Fee Standards for Exhibition Rooms (As attachment 2)
3. Maintenance Fee Standards for Conference Rooms (As attachment 3)
The fees set forth in the standard are stipulated by taking such factors as maintenance costs for equipment in the venues and facilities as well as the consumer price index into consideration.
This standard shall take effect on the day of promulgation.
